title: HAZARDOUS AREAS
fullText:
Work on or near electrical installations or equipment within hazardous areas (e.g. petrochemical installations, grain storage, flour mills) shall only be performed using safe work methods for those premises.
NOTE 1 Guidelines for safe work procedures are provided in AS/NZS 60079.14.
NOTE 2 Regulatory authorities may have requirements regarding competency when working in hazardous areas.
